name: 9 Lives Network
description: The 9 lives serve as a direct representation of all facets of your potential in our physical reality. Each of us go through phases in life and prioritize our energy towards our own particular goals. In the crypto space we are all here for our own reasons; some of us just want to make a bag, some of us are looking for a community, some of us are fighting for a decentralized future. But all of us are stepping out of our comfort zones and believing in something that we truly believe will change the course of history as we know it. We are building the future of tomorrow one action at a time in this matrix of a world that crypto. We have implement AI(Artificial Intelligence) into our smart contract. Our taxes Rotate between 0%-29% Based on buy and sell volumes. The Ai Tax bot works efficiently to make sure the right amount of taxes are put in place to cause more buy pressure when it’s needed and reduce sell pressure during times of growth. It’s a one of kind system that’s custom built into our Smart Contract.
